events.message: I ordered a package two weeks ago, but it still hasn't arrived and the tracking status hasn't updated in days.
Customer issue identified as a delivery delay based on the message content about late shipping and tracking problems.
The case has been assigned to a customer service agent specialized in shipping and delivery issues.
Hello! Thanks for reaching out to us. I’m here to help with your delayed package concern.
Could you please provide your order number and the shipping address so I can check the tracking information more thoroughly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and the shipping address is 45 Main Street, Springfield.
Thank you for the details. I contacted the courier and found the package is delayed due to a sorting issue. We will prioritize the shipment to get it to you within the next three days.
I appreciate the update and quick response. I look forward to receiving the package soon.
Your package was successfully delivered today. Please let us know if there’s anything else we can do for you.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your package in good condition and that you are satisfied with our service.
Thank you for your cooperation. We are closing this case now, but please contact us anytime if you have further questions or concerns.
